title: Amazon Union Vote Set to Begin in New York, Which Has Challenged Company in Past
sub_head: Workers at two Staten Island warehouses could become the first at the company to unionize in the U.S.
body:
Amazon.com Inc. over the next month will face union elections at separate warehouses in New York City, a union-friendly area that has challenged the e-commerce giant in the past.
Current and former workers at the companyâ€™s largest Staten Island warehouse are leading the effort to become the first group of Amazon employees to unionize in the U.S. They are operating without the backing of a major labor union, an uncommon tactic, but one that organizers believe will win support from workers.
